Input.Description: ArrayContains in Select clause with int value and match partial true

Output.SqlQuery: SELECT VALUE ARRAY_CONTAINS(root["ArrayField"], 1, true) FROM root

Input.Description: ArrayContains in Filter clause with int value and match partial true

Output.SqlQuery: SELECT VALUE root FROM root WHERE ARRAY_CONTAINS(root["ArrayField"], 1, true)

Input.Description: ArrayContains in Select clause with object value and match partial true

Output.SqlQuery: SELECT VALUE ARRAY_CONTAINS(root["ObjectArrayField"], {"Field": "abc"}, true) FROM root

Output.SqlQuery: SELECT VALUE root FROM root WHERE ARRAY_CONTAINS(root["ObjectArrayField"], {"Field": "abc"}, true)

Input.Description: ArrayContains in Select clause with int value and match partial false

Output.SqlQuery: SELECT VALUE ARRAY_CONTAINS(root["ArrayField"], 1, false) FROM root

Output.SqlQuery: SELECT VALUE root FROM root WHERE ARRAY_CONTAINS(root["ArrayField"], 1, false)

Input.Description: ArrayContains in Select clause with object value and match partial false

Output.SqlQuery: SELECT VALUE ARRAY_CONTAINS(root["ObjectArrayField"], {"Field": "abc"}, false) FROM root

Output.SqlQuery: SELECT VALUE root FROM root WHERE ARRAY_CONTAINS(root["ObjectArrayField"], {"Field": "abc"}, false)
